DTS:LogProvider.DTS:Description: Writes log entries for events to a SQL Server database
DTS:LogProvider.DTS:ObjectName: SSIS log provider for SQL Server

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
---- inserta nuevas auditoria en la D_MOTIVOS_AUDITORIA insert into D_MOTIVOS_AUDITORIA (Id_Motivo_Auditoria, De_Motivo_Auditoria) select W26COD as Id_Motivo_Auditoria, W26TXT as De_Motivo_Auditoria from HOST03.HOST03.SMPORDD.T126FMOT where w26cod not in (select Id_Motivo_Auditoria from D_MOTIVOS_AUDITORIA) order by W26COD
--- Actualiza la de_Motivo_Auditoria tomando la descripción de la as400 Update D_MOTIVOS_AUDITORIA set De_Motivo_Auditoria = W26TXT from HOST03.HOST03.SMPORDD.T126FMOT as400 inner join D_MOTIVOS_AUDITORIA d on d.Id_Motivo_Auditoria = as400.W26COD where W26TXT not in (select De_Motivo_Auditoria Collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP850_CI_AI from D_MOTIVOS_AUDITORIA)
